message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, Alice.
Okay, Bob, I'll compromise a bit.  Let's try this split.
Come on Alice, I need a bit more than half!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob.  I'm not going to budge much further.
I'm willing to take the risk, Alice. You should accept this offer before the money is worth even less to me.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here, but I'm not going to give you the majority. This is my final offer.
